Attack range +1 tile, attack interval increases, ATK +200%, DEF +20%, and the Mobile Personnel Shield gains DEF +75%. When the Mobile Personnel Shield is deployed, immediately fires a cannon straight ahead, dealing 250% of ATK as Physical damage to enemies within range upon impact or reaching the maximum distance, and Stuns them for 5 seconds
Skill activation grants 20 ammo and the skill ends when all ammo are used (can manually deactivate skill)

elite_levels.description: Can deploy a Mobile Personnel Shield that lasts for 20s; the Mobile Personnel Shield can only be placed in the four adjacent tiles to Jessica the Liberated. After the Mobile Personnel Shield is deployed, Jessica the Liberated immediately turns toward it, and she and the allied unit behind her gains DEF +5%

Can deploy a Mobile Personnel Shield that lasts for 35s; the Mobile Personnel Shield can only be placed in the four adjacent tiles to Jessica the Liberated. After the Mobile Personnel Shield is deployed, Jessica the Liberated immediately turns toward it, and she and the allied unit behind her gains DEF +10%
